subject: Re: Order #SSN1560
description_text:
Hello,
I am waiting for your feedback on order #SSN1560 as I paid for shipping 3-5
business days and today is the fifth day.
I await your kind reply

Il giorno ven 30 mag 2025 alle ore 15:37 Federico Simoncini <
federicosic9@gmail.com> ha scritto:

> Hello, I was wondering how shipping works for this order. I used the $30
> shipping (3-5 business days) but the order includes the VAM Pro Linear
> Motor which I read will ship on June 10th. Will there be two separate
> shipments?
>

conversations.body_text: Hi，Federico Simoncini，     due to the unavailability of the single-direction hydraulic rod, the shipment will be delayed until tomorrow. To make up for the delay, we can refund your expedited shipping fee.

Hi,
Yes please,
Thank you

Il giorno gio 5 giu 2025 alle 13:01 service@simsonn.com

Any news on my order and refund?
